info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Anderson County through 545 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Anderson, or over Anderson Airport, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anderson, Homeland Park, Belton, Williamston, West Pelzer, Anderson Airport, Northlake and Broadway Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
